description:
Today I'm going to start with you the abces of Italian language . It is a very musical language and easy to learn. I hope you follow me step by step to be able to understand and speak italian fluently. I hope you benefit from my videos .

-----------------------------------------

Are you want to learn italian?

are you have spare time?

are you like italian words and want to understand it?

----------------------------------------

will study:

  • Italian alphabet.
  • Italian grammar.
  • Active conversation.
  • Sentences of native italian.
  • Glossary of italian Foods.

*every word will listen,will be able to write it*
title: Read and write any italian word
